website_summaries.verdict: Its utilitarian design encapsulates a highly programmable smart thermostat system, but the complex install may frustrate some owners.
pros: Website interface is very intuitive and easy to use for programming thermostat
Owners like the volume of reporting data they get
Remote settings and programming are simple and easy to use
cons: Thermostat may require furnace connection rewiring to work properly, especially in older homes
On-device screen readings can be confusing
Customer service wait time and helpfulness need improvement, owners say

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up, great features
customer_reviews.text: You have the option to set a range of temperatures to stay in. That saves energy because you're not trying to stay exactly on one degree. You can control the device from your phone or tablet, which is very convenient. We had to get one of these:  and run it to an outlet in the basement. For that reason, set up was a little more complicated than I had anticipated, since we had to put a line lead through the drywall. But it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and no issues for over 5 years!!
customer_reviews.text: We have bought two of these for two different houses. Have not had one issue with either one. We don’t need the most current model that costs more and has more “bells and whistles.” This does everything most others do and the WiFi option is the best. We can check and control both our homes from afar and have peace of mind! You won’t be disappointed. FYI... be sure to check with your HVAC company if your system is still under warranty (a new home or HVAC) as some companies may void your new warranty if you install this yourself and something goes wrong with your system!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Smart-Enough Thermostat without getting crazy
customer_reviews.text: To me this was the perfect balance between the overly complex "learning" thermostats that try to "learn" and the simple manual thermostats. It is programmable, wi-fi compatible, can program and adjust it with a smartphone app, and seamlessly integrates with Amazon Echo/Alexa. It also qualifies as a "smart" thermostat with my power company and so I am eligible for a $50 rebate from them.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Starker

customer_reviews.title: Watch out, a few issues to be aware of
customer_reviews.text: Could be better. I like the charting, but the data is delayed up to 3 hours. so if your interesting in 'real-time' charts, you won't like this. But, the biggest issue for me is there is no alert when the thermostat goes offline. so, for example, if your heater fails or power fails to your heater, you'll never get an alert. Your home could freeze solid, but unless you open the app, you'll never know. (I also use Honeywell remote thermostats, these alert you when they go offline)
customer_reviews.author: K2

customer_reviews.title: Good smart thermostat.
customer_reviews.text: Pros 1. Internet temperature control 2. Automatic air circulation (when configured). This will turn the fan on to circulate the air 5-10 minutes every hour even if it doesn't heat/cool the air. 3. Easy controls on the screen to override when you want to. Cons 1. While walking by these I have brushed up against them and they have lost their connection. Not a huge deal, I just take them off and put them back on again. Neither a pro or con, but thought I would mention it My upstairs furnace didn't have the c wire plugged in on the furnace side. Once I plugged that it in worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: How can you beat being able to adjust the thermostat without getting out of bed? Easy setup and I don't think the server has ever gone down. The GUI is very user-friendly. Scheduling on the web interface is a little confusing at first, but once you get the idea you can set it and forget it. The mobile GUI is equally as user-friendly. I had this integrated into SmartThings hub, but later removed it because it is just easier to deal with the interface supplied with Ecobee, and having both just tends to override each other.
customer_reviews.author: Bigfootbuilt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This ecobee is awesome! I was sooooooo tired of fighting with my kids who kept adjusting the thermostat without permission. Now it's locked down with a code and I don't have to worry anymore. This is so easy to program too and for the first time ever, I have set varying temperatures for times and days. And the app on my phone for this is great - I can adjust the temperature from the convenience of my phone anytime. It looks great on the wall and the display is nice. It's a game changer!
customer_reviews.author: K. Burns

customer_reviews.text: it looks way better in person than on the picture. Quite modern, but bigger, than expected (good, since it covered the hole from the old one). The only downside to the Nest, it doesn't have Away mode. You can manually add your planned vacation, but you can't quickly set it to Away when leaving for a week end (e.g. when I set my Nest to Away, it knows to what temp to hold till I come back and switch it to Home mode).
customer_reviews.author: Marka Twain

customer_reviews.title: Buy a more recent ecobee model than this one!
customer_reviews.text: The product description does not tell you that this model has been passed over by four generations of newer product. Buy one of the latest thermostats.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I love the web portal function
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old programmable thermostat on my 22 year old AMANA furnace with this. Works VERY well, the only issue that I had was getting the wiring straightened out from the mess that the furnace installers left 22 years ago. Now all of the wiring color codes are properly terminated. I love the web portal function. Am monitoring the house from my Droid phone and changing settings remotely. Am very glad that I invested in this instead of the NEST mess.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Love this Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Works great with lots of smart features. Remote control the temp in your house! I did not want a touch screen and too many bells and sensors. This is perfect for my 50 year old home and is a nice update without some large display on the wall. The color screen is nice and can be adjusted for brightness and other features.
customer_reviews.author: TD1983

customer_reviews.title: Not as cool looking (though the newest model is comparable in design ...
customer_reviews.text: we have 3 Nest thermostats in our home. For vacation home we tried this ecobee. Not as cool looking (though the newest model is comparable in design to Nest), this has great features and has a nice iphone app to control it. The time increments are smaller with the ecobee than the Nest, something I really like. Uses less data per month for its online interface. That may not matter to most people, but our vacation home has pay-as-you-go wifi, so that was a factor in our purchase
customer_reviews.author: neiman3

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic thermostat. I own 2 of them to run ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic thermostat. I own 2 of them to run both of my geothermal furnaces. Installation was a breeze. Don't worry about no touch screen. You don't need it. The interface on the unit is nice, but the web and phone apps steal the show. While not as snazzy looking as the Nest, this unit fit my the style of my home better and is better ironed out to accommodate just about any situation. The only issue I see is that the price on this fluctuates wildly. I bought this at $139, but a week later the price was $179. I'm not sure I would have bought this at that price.
customer_reviews.author: David O.

customer_reviews.title: It's OK but has several issues
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to learn how to use it... The web interface is often unavailable, and defaults to blaming the problem on the wifi link, which is NOT accurate. Doesn't seem that there is a manual setting for just shutting the system down when not needed.
customer_reviews.author: John Reimers

customer_reviews.title: Wifi unstable
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Wifi drops out and does not stay connected. Once programmed the stat works good. Can’t connect with phone to adjust temp as thermostat will not stay connected to wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Gary's Mobile

customer_reviews.title: I really do love this unit
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this unit. It's easy to operate, a breeze to install. Some have mentioned that you need the third wire to power the unit , and they are correct. It does require it, but my 35 year old heating unit had it so it's likely yours does too. I'm no specialist, but it took me about 1/2 hour to get everything installed including running a new wire from my heater (my choice, it's not necessary I just wanted to move the unit to a better location). This thing is truly awesome and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Fasdissent

customer_reviews.title: For our household this W-Fi thermostat was perfect for us given the price point and functionality
customer_reviews.text: For our household this W-Fi thermostat was perfect for us given the price point and functionality. My husband and I researched pretty much all the other fancy Wi-Fi thermostats (and newer versions of the Ecobee) and this one fulfills our needs quite well and is simple to use. Very glad we made this investment and do not feel we missed out on any bells or whistles!
customer_reviews.author: Ananda VDB

customer_reviews.title: I Just wanted to say that the ecobee Smart Si can be controled by the Ecobee 3 App
customer_reviews.text: I Just wanted to say that the ecobee Smart Si can be controled by the Ecobee 3 App.on my iphone even though I found nothing to let me know this in advance. I love this thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: ... the app and web portal are extremely intuitive and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product work amazingly well and the app and web portal are extremely intuitive and easy to use. I would recommend this to anyone over any other product of its kind. Better yet, one of the buttons was hard to push on the thermostat itself, I emailed Ecobee and they had a new one shipped out immediately. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Weber

customer_reviews.title: ... thermostat for a year now I can say I love it. I use my smartphone to set back ...
customer_reviews.text: After using this thermostat for a year now I can say I love it. I use my smartphone to set back the temp when away from the house or if I forget to schedule a vacation before leaving. I get alerts when temps are beyond the limits I set. I've saved a bunch using it. I also purchased a control module that can control another appliance using the same interface.
customer_reviews.author: Moonwink

customer_reviews.title: Died an early death
customer_reviews.text: Packed up just outside warranty after one of the many software “upgrades” and wouldn’t connect to WiFi, it went in the bin - avoid unless you live next to the factory
customer_reviews.author: Mr K Fox

customer_reviews.title: I've had it for over a year now. Works ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for over a year now. Works as advertised. It has reduced my bill, no doubt. Easier to set web interface than unit the itself because there are so many options, but it is doable. Installation is not hard if you do the research and follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Moose

customer_reviews.title: Bad programming and poor support
customer_reviews.text: Not good. Poorly programmed and lacking even basic functions like being able to set schedules to the minute. Website syncs with device but sometimes loses data.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermostat, meets expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat is great, worked as promised right out of the box. Controlling it online is a snap and after about 45 days it has not had a single problem. I am looking forward to monitoring and controlling my home heating and cooling while I travel. So far a great purchase and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Hud

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I went ahead and purchased this model based on the reviews with Amazon. I initially was considering the Nest because of its popularity. However, after digging a little deeper on the product it doesnt provide the option of sending low and high temp alerts via email, which is a requirement being a 2nd home. Having an older heating system I didnt have a common wire but decided I'd just run the necessary wiring. It was a bit of a hassle but well worth the effort. The ecobee 3 app works flawlessly. It enables me to increase the temp if I know a storm is coming and there is a possibility of losing power. Anyway, I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Bruce McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: I like the simple looks and the operating design of this ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the simple looks and the operating design of this thermostat. It blends in and is sized about the same of traditional units and operates with a button menu instead of a touch screen.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install -- so many features that the previous t-stat did not have. Easy to program and use -- just set your limits and days and let it do its thing!.

According to Amazon, I should be able to connect the hub and voice control the ecobee. So far, that ain't working. Help?
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best Wifi , you will love it.
customer_reviews.text: The best Wifi, loaded with useful features, capable of just about any setting you need.. Using it in my Barn to control the heating, and love the fact I can access it anywhere via the internet ... Do not hesitate to buy, just beware it requires 3vac @ 24 volts to power it,,,
customer_reviews.author: Michael F. Ricard

customer_reviews.title: Best decision to buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy install considering I purchased two of these for my Motor Home with 2 different connections. These thermostats work perfectly and easy to remotely from all over the world turn them on and off and adjust temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This was my 5th ecobee stat I've purchased. I can not say enough good things about this product and how much money they have saved me. I have several properties that are thousands of miles away and I can monitor them at the touch of a button. AMAZING! AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: ECJ

customer_reviews.title: This thermostat is in my other house, but my ...
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat is in my other house, but my renter loves it. The electric bill is down and the house is cooler. PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Mary Belle

customer_reviews.title: Pro: Webpage control works very well. Remote control ...
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Webpage control works very well. Remote control works very well App works very well Con: Predictable preheat does not work with radiator heating, based on air heating.
customer_reviews.author: H.W. W

customer_reviews.title: the app interface for these on iphone and android is the best i've seen
customer_reviews.text: I've used a couple of different wifi thermostats, the app interface for these on iphone and android is the best i've seen. these are great, very customizable.

customer_reviews.title: Finally an easy to use and well thought out thermostat - great value..
customer_reviews.text: At last a thermostat that is easy to use, WiFi connected and just plain good....had it running for a week now, seen a dramatic improvement in level of comfort. Added bonus is a feature to allow my heat pump / AC to allow outside cooler in to be brought into the house ...

customer_reviews.title: I use in my two detached garages at home. ...
customer_reviews.text: I use in my two detached garages at home. Have them running the heat exhangers from my outdoor wood furnace. App will email me when temps are falling, telling me to stoke my furnace.

customer_reviews.title: Worldwide Thermostat Control
customer_reviews.text: I have had several programmable thermostats. I love this one. Very easy to see, very easy to program, works flawlessly, lots of features, love the WiFi connectivity and the ability to monitor and change the thermostat from my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Internet set up works well and is very user friendly. Had most all options for programming you will ever need to save money on utility expenses.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Linegar

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, and great interface
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these (first and second floor) and am already saving on my electric bill! Easy setup, and great interface. I like the app, and I've got it integrated with SmartThings for more advanced control.
customer_reviews.author: BDobes

customer_reviews.title: FAILED
customer_reviews.text: Failed 1 year and 1 month after purchase. The failure cause my electric bill to skyrocket. Worked fine until then, but not worth purchasing every year, and the loss on utility bill.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product. It works as advertised and found it was not difficult to connect to my network. Outside temp is obtained from the local news station and is sometimes 2 to 4 degrees different than my location so you may still need a house thermometer for accurate readings.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: Sort of expensive thermostat, but no wires to run ...
customer_reviews.text: Sort of expensive thermostat, but no wires to run to the router and can change the temperature from ANYWHERE!, if working overtime or stuck out town just access it through the app and raise the temp since not going to be home possibly for hours
customer_reviews.author: ral c

customer_reviews.title: Have owned this thermostat for 4 months and very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this thermostat for 4 months and very happy so far. It has helped me save a lot on heating bill! My furnace has a blue wire so the installation was like a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: beArNo7

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this as a birthday gift for my husband - ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a birthday gift for my husband - he LOVES it. Thermostat allows you to view usage of both heat and a/c. Also allows you to control temps remotely via bluetooth w/your phone or iPad.
customer_reviews.author: roxie

customer_reviews.title: The thermostat works just like it's advertised
customer_reviews.text: The thermostat works just like it's advertised, took about 45 minutes to install two of them. It's easy to setup a schedule and even easier to use the app to change the temp on the go. Definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Weissman

customer_reviews.title: Far better than NEST.
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my second one of these. Great unit. Much better features than NEST. One runs our pellet stove, this one will run our baseboard heating, likely getting a third for an additional zone.
customer_reviews.author: PhD Fish guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and operate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and operate. Great price compared to other units. Only draw back is that it doesn't have battery back up to keep sending info during a power failure even though I have backup power to my internet. As a frequent traveler I want to know whether no info is because of power or internet failure. I would recommend this unit for most people.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mallett

customer_reviews.title: Lovin lying in bed and adjusting the temp!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Installation was easy, temp is easy to adjust (manually or on app) and if I wake up cold, I just reach for the phone, adjust the temp and snooze until it warms up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reno

customer_reviews.title: Great app and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Great app and inexpensive. Has drastically lowered our energy bills. You can operate your system remotely via phone and web.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic thermostat. The performance and operation are much much ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic thermostat. The performance and operation are much much better than expected. Tons of setting and feature, but the menu system is very easy to use. We mostly access it through the web site or phone app.
customer_reviews.author: superthaix

customer_reviews.title: Great little ecobee though
customer_reviews.text: This model will not control a Humidifier (or other attached accessory). Didn't realize that when purchasing. Great little ecobee though.
customer_reviews.author: SCHOENEY

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, works great. I installed it in a vacation home that's sometimes rented out, and it's possible to configure this in a way that renters can set their temperature very simply, and by touching a button a few times go back into a default "no one's home" mode.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Campbell

customer_reviews.title: The Smart-er Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: I researched the smart thermostats and narrowed it down to the Nest and this EB-SmartSi-01. I read about some issues with the latest Nest so I decided on the ecobee. And I'm glad I did. This one works every bit as well and is less expensive. It does everything the Nest can do except detect if you are currently home but with our thermostat location I doubt that function would really work. I like the ecobee Android based phone app. It is easy to use and allows me to completely control my home thermostat from my smart phone. I also love the monthly reports. If you are considering getting a smart thermostat then you must check this one out.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: NIce unit. Have an older house and wiring
customer_reviews.text: NIce unit. Have an older house and wiring. Had to change from a thermostat 4-wire to a five-wire and it took a bit to make sure which wires to use. Other that that is was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Kindinger

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm right out of the box. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Paul N. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: good wifi thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Once I got the C wire attached correctly at furnace and tstat, and the device programmed, it has worked great. Nice screen and visibility, quick response from mobile device, and can integrate into home automation hubs
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Best wifi stat on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Solid thermostat. Looks great, works great, easy to use. Love the mobile app, the web interface, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Thermostat. A+ for ease of set up and ease of use. 100% of what I was looking for. Well thought out solution from beginning to end. It took 15 mins to install and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A.

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat with powerful features but easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It works great and you can get support via email in a relatively short time
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Attias

customer_reviews.title: thinking that it would be an easy installation. I was hoping to use the same ...
customer_reviews.text: Warning for original owners of the Ecobee "Smart" thermostats. I installed four "Smart" thermostats and today all of the touch screens are generally unresponsive. Since they are over 3 years old, they are not covered under warranty. So I ordered the upgraded version, the "Smart si", thinking that it would be an easy installation. I was hoping to use the same backplate. However, the Smart used 4 lead wires and the Smart si uses 5-8 lead wires, so upgrading will require rewiring. Ecobee certainly hasn't made it easy to upgrade! I like the Ecobee products, but it may be time to try some others that are in the market today.
customer_reviews.author: WKB

customer_reviews.title: best t-stat I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is a great t-stat gives you great info on the operation of your system
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: A great thermostat.
customer_reviews.text: I his is really a great thermostat even if it didn't have the wifi feature. With is it is superb.

customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and setup. Does everything I need it to do and more. Easy to use mobile app. Good price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I installed it my self and the instructions were clear.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it - simple, reliable
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Had Honeywell WiFI thermostats before, and always had issues connecting to Wifi, but the EcoBee is simple and reliable. Spend the extra bucks and get an EcoBee.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product and tech support from Canada.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Magnon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.text: We had to have our electrician install the thermostat because we went from a line voltage to low voltage. As soon as it was powered on it has worked great. It is so easy to set up the schedule and I am constantly using the app to change the temp in the house. Sometimes we don't feel like getting up and will use the app to turn on the heat while sitting on the couch. We have forced hot air and this thermostat learned how to keep our house from getting too cold by heating up 1 degree over the set temp and turning on after a drop of 2 degrees. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Saab-Queen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set-up and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set-up and use. Cell phone app really nice to cool off the house before you get home on a 100 degree Texas day.
customer_reviews.author: Cherilyn Powell

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Totally cool. Very reliable, very helpful, and saves on bills and repair costs. This seems to be easier on equipment and it seems like the compressor doesn't run as often. Apparently it uses algorithms to calculate time and frequency of compressor activity in order to maximize effeciency. The programmability is excellent and easy to do on the website login. It's also easy to just walk up to hit and push the arrow buttons to change the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: This one works great, and doesn't cost an arm and a leg
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a WiFi thermostat for awhile now, but could not just justify the cost of a NEST. This one works great, and doesn't cost an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan G.

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I installed this a few days ago and once I got used to the controls and had all the settings where I wanted them, I couldn't be happier. I'm pleasantly surprised with available options and settings...can adjust to meet just about anyone's needs. A family member is a prior HVAC repair tech and after checking this unit out he was so impressed he went to order one for his home. For what you get the price is very reasonable. Stop reading and just buy one...you won't regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The thermostat works like a charm. Love the fact that I can get online reports about the temp outside and in, along with the humidity, days afterwards. I have several times messed with the settings from work for people at the house. I had to adjust what it was reading the temperature at, because it said that it was 4 degrees cooler in the house than it actually was. Once we adjusted that, it cooled to the temperature that was ideal for us. Our electrical bill has dropped, and it has been hot outside, just like the month before. I have recommended it already to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased first unit July 2014. Installation was pretty uneventful. Connected to WiFi easily. Very happy with the product. Ended up moving and installing a second unit in new place. The first unit was very handy to monitor and control temps remotely for guests and renters in the first home. Was just notified the first unit stopped working, just a month after the three year warranty, classic. Might contact ecobee to see what they say. For this reason I drop to a four star rating what would otherwise be a 5 star for a great product. I am still ordering an identical replacement which will be my third unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: The ecobee EB-SMARTSi-01 Smart Thermostat is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in an older house with a water radiator heating system and that used only two wires to the thermostat. I removed the Honeywell mercury switch thermostat and installed the ecobee thermostat, following the manual's instructions for all aspects including wiring, setup entering the Wi-Fi password into the thermostat which delivered a code which I entered into the ecobee website and finally registered the thermostat so the ecobee portal would be activated. Everything works great. I can view & control the temperature and view the humidity from my workplace.
customer_reviews.author: Minneapolis Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this device. Way better than any of our Honeywell devices.
customer_reviews.author: Mastergardener

customer_reviews.title: My better half did the software programming and wifi connection
customer_reviews.text: Installed OK after carefully studying the instructions. My better half did the software programming and wifi connection, and it works.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Moran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Nice to use the net to track use and change settings.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect thermostat
customer_reviews.text: First, it was an easy installation with great support from the manufacturer. Once installed it looks good on the wall. And the system intuitive and powerful and already helping me use less propane. The UI of the website and app could use an overhaul, but the functionality needed is fully there so I can't complain. I would buy again and again and expect it only to get better.
customer_reviews.author: P.G.

product_meta.title: ecobee Smart Si Thermostat 2 Heat-2 Cool with Full Color NON-Touch Screen
product_meta.description: The Smart Si Thermostat from EcoBee is a Zigbee compatible, Wi-Fi enabled, energy saving solution that gives users total control over their home's heating and air conditioning from anywhere with an Internet connection. The Smart Si Thermostat from EcoBee is a Zigbee compatible, Wi-Fi enabled, energy saving solution that gives users total control over their home's heating and air conditioning from anywhere with an Internet connection. The screen of the Smart Si has a high resolution, easy to read color display to show the indoor temperature as well as the live outdoor weather and forecasting. With the Smart Si Thermostat, users will receive access to a free, secure web portal, allowing full thermostat control from any location with an Internet connection. The convenience doesn't end there - the EcoBee Smart Si Thermostat also has a free downloadable mobile app for iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch and Android devices. The ease of access to this thermostat allows for total control from anywhere in the world, which can lead to increased energy savings and lower electric bills. Users can easily set energy saving programs that cater to their schedule and can be adjusted on the fly, whether your stuck at the office late, sitting in traffic or on vacation. Programmable periods can be set for when you're awake, sleeping, home or away and even custom periods for vacations, weekends and more. Seven-day programming gives the option of individual settings for each day of the week or users can take advantage of 365-day scheduling. Because this thermostat is smart, it also has the ability to communicate through email alerts when something isn't quite right with the system or if maintenance is needed. The Smart Si Thermostat can support up to 2 heat and 2 cool stages on a conventional system or up to 3 heat and 2 cool stages on a heat pump system.
